name: Trapped (itch) (N4bA)
description:
You don’t remember who you are, you don’t remember how you got here, and all you have to do is research these terrifying labyrinths in search of a way out and try not to die.

--------------------------------------------------------

To complete the game you will need 40-90 minutes

(в игре есть русский язык :-) )

controls:

W A S D - move

Mouse - look

E - interact

Shift - run (if the monster is near)

F - lighter
